name: Elom
Lore: 'Many Elom commit sabotage and theft against the Empire to avenge the invasion of their homeworld. Experts in adapting stolen equipment for use by the Rebellion.',
Text: 'Power +3 at same site as an Imperial. For remainder of game, Plastoid Armor is an Effect, is not unique, is immune to Alter while on table, and it deploys only on a Rebel or alien at same mobile site as Elom (character is now ''disguised'').',
